Detailed Description

Listener for Image replies. The abstract functions are the callback functions that is called for the respective events.

Create a subclass and implement the callbacks and add a subclass object to the ImageInterface to start getting imageReply callbacks.

The error function, declared in the super class Listener, will be called for all requests that returns with an error. The status code can be either from the StatusCode enumeration or from ImageStatusCode enumeration.

virtual void WFAPI::ImageListener::imageReply ( RequestID  requestID,
const WFString &  imageName,
const ImageReplyData &  imageReplyData 
) [pure virtual]

Called when an image request, which are sent by calling getImage in ImageInterface, returns with the image.

Parameters:
requestID The identification of the getImage request sent from the ImageInterface.
imageName The name of the image.
imageReplyData The image buffer.

) [pure virtual]

Called when an image request, which are sent by calling getImage in ImageInterface, returns with the image written to file.

Parameters:
